Package org.yamcs.api.artemis

Class ArtemisEventProducer

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.yamcs.api.AbstractEventProducer
      • org.yamcs.api.artemis.ArtemisEventProducer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventListener, ConnectionListener, EventProducer
    public class ArtemisEventProducer
extends AbstractEventProducer
implements ConnectionListener
    An EventProducer that publishes events over Artemis

    By default, repeated message are detected and reduced, resulting in pseudo events with a message like 'last event repeated X times'. This behaviour can be turned off.

        public void connected​(String url)
        Description copied from interface: ConnectionListener
        Called after a successful connection to the yamcs server has been established.

        Note: when using a re-connecting YamcsConnector, this method is also called after a successful re-connection attempt.
